languages.text: Увидев вновь корабль Вольного Торговца, пираты разворачивают свое судно. Авгуры передают тревожный сигнал: их орудия заряжены и готовы к бою!

traits.locale_text: Увидев вновь корабль Вольного Торговца, пираты разворачивают свое судно. Авгуры передают тревожный сигнал: их орудия заряжены и готовы к бою!

languages.text: Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!
languages.original_text: Увидев вновь корабль Вольного Торговца, пираты разворачивают свое судно. Авгуры передают тревожный сигнал: их орудия заряжены и готовы к бою!

traits.locale_text: Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel towards it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!
Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!
Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!
Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!

languages.text: 等海盗们再次注意到行商浪人的船时，他们已经调整好船头，对准了目标。俄歇矩阵发出了警告！海盗船的宏炮已经装填完毕，准备迎接战斗！
languages.original_text: Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!

traits.locale_text: 等海盗们再次注意到行商浪人的船时，他们已经调整好船头，对准了目标。俄歇矩阵发出了警告！海盗船的宏炮已经装填完毕，准备迎接战斗！

languages.text: 再び自由開拓者の船に気づいた海賊は、船の向きを変える。スキャナーが警報を鳴らす。海賊の船の大砲には砲弾がつめられ、いつでも戦闘を開始できる！
languages.original_text: Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!

traits.locale_text: 再び自由開拓者の船に気づいた海賊は、船の向きを変える。スキャナーが警報を鳴らす。海賊の船の大砲には砲弾がつめられ、いつでも戦闘を開始できる！

languages.text: Al ver de nuevo la nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, los piratas giran su nave hacia ella. Los augures dan la alarma: ¡los cañones de la nave pirata están cargados y listos para la batalla!
languages.original_text: Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!

traits.locale_text: Al ver de nuevo la nave {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, los piratas giran su nave hacia ella. Los augures dan la alarma: ¡los cañones de la nave pirata están cargados y listos para la batalla!{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text: Als sie das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wieder bemerken, richten die Piraten ihr eigenes Schiff danach aus. Die Auguren schlagen Alarm: Die Geschütze des Piratenschiffs sind geladen und bereit für den Kampf!
languages.original_text: Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!

traits.locale_text: Als sie das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wieder bemerken, richten die Piraten ihr eigenes Schiff danach aus. Die Auguren schlagen Alarm: Die Geschütze des Piratenschiffs sind geladen und bereit für den Kampf!

languages.text: Dès qu'ils repèrent à nouveau le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les pirates tournent leurs appareils dans sa direction. Les augures donnent l'alerte : leurs canons sont chargés et prêts à faire feu !
languages.original_text: Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!

traits.locale_text: Dès qu'ils repèrent à nouveau le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, les pirates tournent leurs appareils dans sa direction. Les augures donnent l'alerte : leurs canons sont chargés et prêts à faire feu !

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in gemisini yeniden fark eden korsanlar, gemilerini döndürüyor. Alametler alarm veriyor: Korsan gemisinin topları dolu ve savaş pozisyonunda!
languages.original_text: Upon noticing the Rogue Trader's ship again, the pirates turn their vessel toward it. The augurs sound the alarm: the pirate vessel's cannons are loaded and ready for battle!
